description: revolver shoots coins into a slot on a Western-style building; man standing in front of building wearing a cowboy hat has the hat shot off by the coin; in the same motion, the man's arms raise in surrender
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

same side as sticker, raised: [WILD WEST BANK]; undersides, molded: [DURO MOLD AND M.F.G. INC. DETROIT 34 MICH. U.S.A.] and [ PAT. PENDING U.S. AND CANADA]
markings: at one side, on decal: [Shoot you Savings ... to-- / THE SECOND NATIONAL BANK / of Warren / Member F.D.I.C.]
title: "Wild West Bank" mechanical bank
